doc.title: Edin kinoman v nachaloto na veka
doc.plot: The film presents Georgi Angelov - Zhoro, believed to be the greatest Bulgarian movie fan. Zhoro's life is remarkable love story, a long-lasting declaration of love for cinema and for those who make it. He is ever so passionate in frequenting cinema theaters, regarding with reverence the shadows on the screen. Zhoro lives through and for movies.
